items.sentence: Tom and Mary gave exactly the same answers on the test which made the teacher suspicious.
Tom thought he could reach the airport on time if he drove a little over the speed limit.
Tom shaved off his beard and dyed his hair blonde, hoping people wouldn\'t recognize him.
Tom stared at Mary for a moment wondering if there was something she wasn\'t telling him.
Tom wanted to give you a surprise party, but I knew you\'d hate it, so I told him not to.
